00027 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_point_kernel(float* x, float* alpha){
00028         return (1.0f/((*x)*(*x)) )*pow(1.0f - (*x), 1.0f / (*alpha));
00029 }
00030 
00031 void SGP_RDD_Katz_point_kernelS(int *n, float* x, float* alpha, float* f){
00032         int i;
00033         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00034                 f[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_kernel(&(x[i]),alpha);
00035         };
00036 }
00037 
00038 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_point_coeff_Gy(float* C_J_m,float* Z_eff, float* beta, float* alpha, float* density_kg_m3, float* r_max_m){
00039         return (*C_J_m) * (*Z_eff)*(*Z_eff) / (2.0f * M_PI * (*beta)*(*beta) * (*alpha) * (*density_kg_m3) * (*r_max_m)* (*r_max_m));
00040 }
00041 
00042 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(float* r_m, float* alpha, float* r_max_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy){
00043         float x = (*r_m)/(*r_max_m);
00044         return (*Katz_point_coeff_Gy) * SGP_RDD_Katz_point_kernel(&x,alpha);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void SGP_RDD_Katz_point_GyS(int *n, float* r_m, float* alpha, float* r_max_m,float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy, float * D){
00048         int i;
00049         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00050                 D[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(&(r_m[i]),alpha,r_max_m,Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00051         };
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_kernel(float* x, float* alpha){
00055         return (1.0f/(*x) )*pow(1.0f - (*x), 1.0f / (*alpha));
00056 }
00057 
00058 void SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_kernelS(int *n, float* x, float* alpha, float* f){
00059         int i;
00060         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00061                 f[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_kernel(&(x[i]),alpha);
00062         };
00063 }
00064 
00065 double SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_integrand(double x, void * params){
00066         float alpha = ((float*)params)[0];
00067         float f_x = (float)(x);
00068         return (double)SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_kernel( &f_x, &alpha);
00069 }
00070 
00071 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m(float* r_max_m, float* density_kg_m3, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy){
00072         return 2 * M_PI * (*density_kg_m3) * (*r_max_m)*(*r_max_m) * (*Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00073 }
00074 
00075 float SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_J_m(    float* alpha,
00076                                                                 float* r_min_m,
00077                                                                 float* r_max_m,
00078                                                                 float* Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m){
00079         double dEdx_integral = 0.0;
00080         if( (*r_min_m) < (*r_max_m)){
00081                 dEdx_integral = (*alpha/(1.+(*alpha))) * pow( 1.-(*r_min_m)/(*r_max_m) , 1. +
00082                                 1./(*alpha) ) *
00083                                 gsl_sf_hyperg_2F1(1.,1.+1./(*alpha),2.+1./(*alpha),1.-(*r_min_m)/(*r_max_m));
00084         }
00085         return (*Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m)*(float)dEdx_integral;
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_site_Gy(float* r_m, float* alpha, float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* LET_J_m, float* density_kg_m3, float* Katz_dEdx_J_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy){
00089         if( (*r_m) < (*r_min_m) ){
00090                 return (1.0f / ((*density_kg_m3) * M_PI * (*r_min_m)*(*r_min_m)))*((*LET_J_m) - (*Katz_dEdx_J_m));
00091         } else {
00092                 return SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(r_m, alpha, r_max_m, Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00093         }
00094         return 0.0f;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void SGP_RDD_Katz_site_GyS(int *n, float* r_m, float* alpha, float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* LET_J_m, float* density_kg_m3, float* Katz_dEdx_J_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy, float * D_Gy){
00098         int i;
00099         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00100                 D_Gy[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_site_Gy(&(r_m[i]),alpha,r_min_m,r_max_m,LET_J_m,density_kg_m3,Katz_dEdx_J_m,Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00101         };
00102 }
00103 
00104 float
00105 geometryFunctionPhi (float* r0_m, float* a0_m, float* r_m)
00106 {
00107 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00108 //              indnt_init();
00109 //              fprintf(debf,"%sr0_m = %g , a0_m = %g , r_m = %g\n",isp,*r0_m,*a0_m, *r_m);
00110 //#endif
00111         float res = 0.;
00112         double factor = 0.;
00113         gsl_complex carg, cres;
00114         if ((*r_m) <= fabs ((*r0_m) - (*a0_m)))
00115         {
00116                 if ((*r0_m) >= (*a0_m))
00117                         res = 0.0f;
00118                 else
00119                         res = (float)M_PI;
00120 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00121 //              indnt_init();
00122 //              fprintf(debf,"%sA res = %g\n",isp,res);
00123 //#endif
00124         }
00125         else
00126         {
00127                 factor = gsl_pow_2 (*a0_m) - gsl_pow_2 ((*r0_m) - (*r_m));
00128                 factor /= gsl_pow_2 ((*r_m) + (*r0_m)) - gsl_pow_2 (*a0_m);
00129 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00130 //              indnt_init();
00131 //              fprintf(debf,"%sB factor = %g\n",isp,factor);
00132 //#endif
00133                 GSL_SET_COMPLEX (&carg, sqrt (factor), 0.);
00134                 cres = gsl_complex_arctan (carg);
00135                 res = 2.0f * (float)(GSL_REAL (cres));
00136 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00137 //              indnt_init();
00138 //              fprintf(debf,"%sB res = %g\n",isp,res);
00139 //#endif
00140         }
00141         return res;
00142 }
00143 
00144 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_kernel_Gy(float* t_m, float *r_m, float* a0_m, float* alpha, float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy){
00145 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00146 //              indnt_init();
00147 //              fprintf(debf,"%st_m = %g , a0_m = %g , r_m = %g\n",isp,*t_m,*a0_m, *r_m);
00148 //              fprintf(debf,"%sf1 = %g\n",isp,(1.0f/ (M_PI * (*a0_m)*(*a0_m))));
00149 //              fprintf(debf,"%sf2 = %g\n",isp,SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(t_m,alpha,r_max_m,Katz_point_coeff_Gy));
00150 //              fprintf(debf,"%sf3 = %g\n",isp,geometryFunctionPhi(r_m,a0_m,t_m));
00151 //#endif
00152         if( (*t_m) < (*r_min_m ) )
00153                 return 0.0;
00154         if( (*t_m) >= (*a0_m) + (*r_m) )
00155                 return 0.0;
00156         if( ((*r_m) >= (*a0_m)) && ((*t_m) <= (*r_m) - (*a0_m)))
00157                 return 0.0;
00158         else
00159                 return  (1.0f/ (M_PI * (*a0_m)*(*a0_m))) * SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(t_m,alpha,r_max_m,Katz_point_coeff_Gy) *  geometryFunctionPhi(r_m,a0_m,t_m) * (*t_m);
00160 }
00161 
00162 void SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_kernel_GyS(int *n, float* t_m, float *r_m, float* a0_m, float* alpha, float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy, float * D_Gy){
00163         int i;
00164         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00165 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00166 //              indnt_init();
00167 //              fprintf(debf,"%st_m[%d] = %g\n",isp,i,t_m[i]);
00168 //#endif
00169                 D_Gy[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_kernel_Gy(   &(t_m[i]), r_m,a0_m, alpha,
00170                                                                                                 r_min_m, r_max_m, Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00171         };
00172 }
00173 
00174 double SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_integrand_Gy(   double t_m, void * params){
00175         float r_m                                       = ((float*)params)[0];
00176         float a0_m                                      = ((float*)params)[1];
00177         float alpha                             = ((float*)params)[2];
00178         float r_min_m                           = ((float*)params)[3];
00179     float r_max_m                               = ((float*)params)[4];
00180     float Katz_point_coeff_Gy   = ((float*)params)[5];
00181         float f_t_m                             = (float)(t_m);
00182         return (double)SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_kernel_Gy(      &f_t_m, &r_m, &a0_m, &alpha,
00183                                                                                                 &r_min_m, &r_max_m, &Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00184 }
00185 
00186 inline float SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_Gy(       float *r_m, float* a0_m, float* alpha,
00187                                                                         float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy){
00188         double int_lim_m = 0.0f;
00189         if( (*r_m) > (*a0_m) ){
00190                 int_lim_m = GSL_MAX((*r_m) - (*a0_m),*r_min_m);
00191         }
00192     gsl_set_error_handler_off();
00193 
00194         double ext_integral_Gy;
00195         double error;
00196         gsl_integration_workspace *w1 = gsl_integration_workspace_alloc (10000);
00197         gsl_function F;
00198         F.function = &SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_integrand_Gy;
00199         float params[] = {*r_m,*a0_m,*alpha,*r_min_m,*r_max_m,*Katz_point_coeff_Gy};
00200         F.params = params;
00201         int status = gsl_integration_qags (&F, int_lim_m, (*r_m)+(*a0_m), 1e-9, 1e-4, 10000, w1, &ext_integral_Gy, &error);
00202         if (status == GSL_EROUND || status == GSL_ESING){
00203 #ifdef _DEBUG
00204                 indnt_init();
00205                 fprintf(debf,"%s r=%g, integration from %g to %g , error no == %d\n",isp,*r_m,int_lim_m,(*r_m)+(*a0_m),status);
00206 #endif
00207                 ext_integral_Gy = -1.0f;
00208         }
00209         gsl_integration_workspace_free (w1);
00210 
00211         return ext_integral_Gy;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_GyS(int *n, float *r_m, float* a0_m, float* alpha, float* r_min_m, float* r_max_m, float* Katz_point_coeff_Gy, float * D_Gy){
00215         int i;
00216         for( i = 0 ; i < *n ; i++){
00217                 D_Gy[i] = SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_Gy(&(r_m[i]), a0_m, alpha, r_min_m, r_max_m, Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00218         };
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*      f1_parameters:
00222  *              0 - LET_MeV_cm2_g
00223  *              1 - r_min_m
00224  *              2 - r_max_m
00225  *              3 - d_min_Gy
00226  *              4 - d_max_Gy
00227  *              5 - k                                           (norm. constant)
00228  *              6 - single_impact_fluence_cm2
00229  *              7 - single_impact_dose_Gy
00230  *              8 - dEdx_MeV_cm2_g
00231  */
00232 void SGP_RDD_f1_parameters(     /* radiation field parameters */
00233                                                         float*  E_MeV_u,
00234                                                         long*   particle_no,
00235                                                         /* detector parameters */
00236                                                         long*   material_no,
00237                                                         /* radial dose distribution model */
00238                                                         long*   rdd_model,
00239                                                         float*  rdd_parameter,
00240                                                         /* electron range model */
00241                                                         long*   er_model,
00242                                                         float*  er_parameter,
00243                                                         /* calculated parameters */
00244                                                         float * f1_parameters)
00245 {
00246 
00247 
00248 #ifdef _DEBUG
00249         indnt_init();
00250         indnt_inc();
00251         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_RDD_f1_parameters\n",isp);
00252         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin RDD model = %ld\n",isp,*rdd_model);
00253         fprintf(debf,"%sMaterial = %ld\n", isp, *material_no);
00254 #endif
00255 
00256 
00257 
00258         // Get beta, Z and Zeff
00259         long    n_tmp           = 1;
00260         float   beta            = 0.0f;
00261         long    Z                       = 0;
00262         float   Z_eff           = 0.0f;
00263         SGP_beta_from_particle_no(      &n_tmp,
00264                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00265                                                                         particle_no,
00266                                                                         &beta);
00267         SGP_Z_from_particle_no( &n_tmp,
00268                                                                 particle_no,
00269                                                                 &Z);
00270         SGP_effective_charge_from_beta( &n_tmp,
00271                                                                         &beta,
00272                                                                         &Z,
00273                                                                         &Z_eff);
00274 
00275         // Get energy constant C == k
00276         float   density_g_cm3, density_kg_m3, electron_density_m3, I_eV, alpha_g_cm2_MeV, p_MeV, m_g_cm2;
00277         SGP_getMaterialData(    &n_tmp,
00278                                                         material_no,
00279                                                         &density_g_cm3,
00280                                                         &electron_density_m3,
00281                                                         &I_eV,
00282                                                         &alpha_g_cm2_MeV,
00283                                                         &p_MeV,
00284                                                         &m_g_cm2);
00285         density_kg_m3                   =       density_g_cm3 * 1000.0f;
00286 
00287         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00288         // PARAMETER 0: Get the LET (same for all models)
00289         SGP_LET_MeV_cm2_g(      &n_tmp,
00290                                                 E_MeV_u,
00291                                                 particle_no,
00292                                                 material_no,
00293                                                 &f1_parameters[0]);
00294 
00295         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00296         // PARAMETER 1: Get the LET maximum electron range (same for all RDD models)
00297         SGP_max_electron_range_m(       &n_tmp,
00298                                                                 E_MeV_u,
00299                                                                 particle_no,
00300                                                                 material_no,
00301                                                                 er_model,
00302                                                                 &f1_parameters[2]);
00303 
00304 
00305         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00306         // MODEL SPEZIFIC PARAMETERS
00307         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Test){
00308                 f1_parameters[1]        = 0.0f;                                                                                                                                                                                         // r_min_m
00309                 f1_parameters[6]        = 1.0f / (pi * f1_parameters[2]*f1_parameters[2] * m_to_cm * m_to_cm);                                                          // pi * r_max_m^2 = Track area -> single_impact_fluence [1/cm2]
00310                 f1_parameters[5]        = f1_parameters[6] * f1_parameters[0] * MeV_to_J * 1000.0f;                                                                                     // LET  / track area = Norm.constant k
00311                 f1_parameters[3]        = f1_parameters[5];                                                                                                                                                                     // d_min_Gy = k
00312                 f1_parameters[4]        = f1_parameters[5];                                                                                                                                                                     // d_max_Gy = k
00313                 f1_parameters[7]        = f1_parameters[0] * f1_parameters[5] * MeV_g_to_J_kg;                                                                                          // single_impact_dose = LET * fluence;
00314                 f1_parameters[8]        = f1_parameters[0];                                                                                                                                                                     // dEdx = LET
00315         }
00316 
00317         if( *rdd_model == RDD_KatzPoint || *rdd_model == RDD_Site || *rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00318                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00319                 float alpha                             =       1.667f;
00320                 float w_el_keV                  =       2.0f * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * 1000.0f * beta*beta / (1 - beta*beta);
00321                 if(w_el_keV <= 1.0f){
00322                         alpha                                   = 1.079f;
00323                 }
00324                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00325 
00326                 f1_parameters[1]                =       rdd_parameter[0];                                                               // r_min_m
00327                 if (f1_parameters[2] <= f1_parameters[1]){
00328                         f1_parameters[1] = f1_parameters[2];}                                                                   // If r.max < a0 or r.min, r.min = r.max, not a0
00329 
00330                 float   N_el_cm3                =       electron_density_m3 / (100*100*100);
00331                 float   C_J_cm                  =       2.0f * pi * N_el_cm3 * (e_esu*e_esu*e_esu*e_esu) / (electron_mass_g * c_cm_s *c_cm_s) * 1e-7;   // energy constant [J/cm] not [erg/cm] hence 10^-7
00332                 float   C_J_m                   =       C_J_cm * 100.0f;
00333                 f1_parameters[5]                =       C_J_m;                                                                                  // Norm.constant k
00334 
00335 
00336                 // Get dEdx by simple integration from r_min_m (in case of RDD_Site = a0) to r_max_m
00337                 float   dEdx_J_m                =       0.0f;
00338                 float   LET_J_m                 =       f1_parameters[0] * 1.602e-13 * density_g_cm3 * 100.0f;
00339 
00340                 float Katz_point_coeff_Gy = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_coeff_Gy(&C_J_m,&Z_eff,&beta,&alpha,&density_kg_m3,&(f1_parameters[2]));
00341                 float Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m = SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m(&(f1_parameters[2]),&density_kg_m3,&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00342                 dEdx_J_m = SGP_RDD_Katz_dEdx_J_m(&alpha,&(f1_parameters[1]),&(f1_parameters[2]),&Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m);
00343 
00344                 float   dEdx_MeV_g_cm2          =       dEdx_J_m / 100.0f / density_g_cm3 / MeV_to_J;
00345 
00346 #ifdef _DEBUG
00347         fprintf(debf,"%sLET_J_m = %g\n",isp,LET_J_m);
00348         fprintf(debf,"%sKatz_point_coeff_Gy = %g\n",isp,Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00349         fprintf(debf,"%sKatz_dEdx_coeff_J_m = %g\n",isp,Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m);
00350 #endif
00351 
00352                 f1_parameters[8]                =       dEdx_MeV_g_cm2;
00353 
00354                 if( *rdd_model != RDD_ExtTarget )
00355                         f1_parameters[3]                =       rdd_parameter[1];
00356                 else
00357                         f1_parameters[3]                =       rdd_parameter[2];
00358 
00359                 // d_max_Gy
00360                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site){
00361                         float tmp = 0.0f;
00362 //                      f1_parameters[4]                =       1.0f / (density_kg_m3 * pi * f1_parameters[1]*f1_parameters[1]) * (LET_J_m - dEdx_J_m);
00363                         f1_parameters[4]                =       SGP_RDD_Katz_site_Gy(&tmp,&alpha,&(f1_parameters[1]),&(f1_parameters[2]),&LET_J_m,&density_kg_m3,&Katz_dEdx_coeff_J_m,&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00364                 }else if(*rdd_model == RDD_KatzPoint){
00365 //                      f1_parameters[4]                =       C_J_m * Z_eff*Z_eff / (2.0f * pi * f1_parameters[1]*f1_parameters[1] * beta*beta * alpha * density_kg_m3) * pow(1.0f - f1_parameters[1] / f1_parameters[2], 1.0f / alpha);
00366                         f1_parameters[4]                =       SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(&(f1_parameters[1]),&alpha,&(f1_parameters[2]),&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00367                 } else { // RDD_ExtTarget
00368                         f1_parameters[4]                =       SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_Gy(&(f1_parameters[1]),&(rdd_parameter[1]),&alpha,&(f1_parameters[1]),&(f1_parameters[2]),&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 // single impact fluence
00372                 f1_parameters[6]        = 1.0f / (pi * (f1_parameters[2] * m_to_cm) * (f1_parameters[2] * m_to_cm));    // single_impact_fluence [1/cm2]
00373                 // single_impact_dose
00374                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site){
00375                         f1_parameters[7]                =       f1_parameters[0] * MeV_g_to_J_kg * f1_parameters[6];                            // LET * fluence
00376                 }else{
00377                         f1_parameters[7]                =       f1_parameters[8] * MeV_g_to_J_kg * f1_parameters[6];                            // dEdx * fluence
00378                 }
00379         }
00380 
00381         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Geiss){
00382                 f1_parameters[1]        =       rdd_parameter[0];                                                                                                                       // "r_min_m" = a0
00383                 if (f1_parameters[2] <= f1_parameters[1]){
00384                         f1_parameters[1] = f1_parameters[2];}                   // If r.max < a0, r.min = r.max, not a0
00385                 // Normalization to match with LET
00386                 float   tmp                     = (float)(0.5f + log(f1_parameters[2] / f1_parameters[1]));
00387                 tmp                                     *= 2.0f * pi * (f1_parameters[1] * m_to_cm) * (f1_parameters[1] * m_to_cm);
00388                 f1_parameters[5]        = f1_parameters[0] * MeV_g_to_J_kg / tmp;                                                                               // k = LET / tmp
00389                 f1_parameters[6]        = 1.0f / (pi * (f1_parameters[2] * m_to_cm) * (f1_parameters[2] * m_to_cm));    // single_impact_fluence [1/cm2]
00390                 f1_parameters[7]        = f1_parameters[0] * MeV_g_to_J_kg * f1_parameters[6];                                                  // single_impact_dose = LET * single_impact_fluence
00391                 f1_parameters[4]        = f1_parameters[5];                                                                                                                             // d_max_Gy = k
00392                 f1_parameters[3]        = f1_parameters[5] * f1_parameters[1]*f1_parameters[1] / (f1_parameters[2]*f1_parameters[2]);                           // d_min_Gy
00393                 f1_parameters[8]        = f1_parameters[0];                                                                                                                             // dEdx = LET
00394         }
00395 
00396 #ifdef _DEBUG
00397         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[1] (r_min_m) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[1]);
00398         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[2] (r_max_m) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[2]);
00399         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[3] (d_min_Gy) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[3]);
00400         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[4] (d_max_Gy) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[4]);
00401         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[6] (single_impact_fluence) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[6]);
00402         fprintf(debf,"%sf1_parameters[7] (single_impact_dose) = %g\n",isp,f1_parameters[7]);
00403 #endif
00404 
00405 #ifdef _DEBUG
00406         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_RDD_f1_parameters\n",isp);
00407         indnt_dec();
00408 #endif
00409 
00410 }
00411 
00412 void SGP_D_RDD_Gy       (       long*   n,
00413                 float*  r_m,
00414                 /* radiation field parameters */
00415                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00416                 long*   particle_no,
00417                 /* detector parameters */
00418                 long*   material_no,
00419                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00420                 long*   rdd_model,
00421                 float*  rdd_parameter,
00422                 /* electron range model */
00423                 long*   er_model,
00424                 float*  er_parameter,
00425                 float*  D_RDD_Gy)
00426 {
00427 #ifdef _DEBUG
00428         indnt_init();
00429         indnt_inc();
00430         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_D_RDD_Gy\n",isp);
00431 #endif
00432 
00433         // conversion through int
00434 #ifdef _R
00435         int n_int = (int)(*n);
00436         *n = (long)n_int;
00437 
00438         int rdd_model_int = (int)(*rdd_model);
00439         *rdd_model = (long)rdd_model_int;
00440 
00441         int er_model_int = (int)(*er_model);
00442         *er_model = (long)er_model_int;
00443 
00444         int material_no_int     = (int)(*material_no);
00445         *material_no = (long)material_no_int;
00446 
00447         int particle_no_int = (int)(*particle_no);
00448         *particle_no = (long)particle_no_int;
00449 #endif
00450 
00451 #ifdef _DEBUG
00452         fprintf(debf,"%sn = %ld\n", isp, *n);
00453         fprintf(debf,"%sModel = %ld \n", isp, *rdd_model);
00454         fprintf(debf,"%sMaterial = %ld\n", isp, *material_no);
00455 #endif
00456 
00457         long            i;
00458         long            n_tmp                   = 1;
00459         // Get f1 parameters
00460         long            n_f1_parameters = 9;
00461         float*          f1_parameters   = (float*)calloc(n_f1_parameters, sizeof(float));
00462         SGP_RDD_f1_parameters(                  /* radiation field parameters */
00463                         E_MeV_u,
00464                         particle_no,
00465                         /* detector parameters */
00466                         material_no,
00467                         /* radial dose distribution model */
00468                         rdd_model,
00469                         rdd_parameter,
00470                         /* electron range model */
00471                         er_model,
00472                         er_parameter,
00473                         /* calculated parameters */
00474                         f1_parameters);
00475 
00476         // Get material data
00477         float           density_g_cm3, electron_density_m3, I_eV, alpha_g_cm2_MeV, p_MeV, m_g_cm2;
00478         SGP_getMaterialData(    &n_tmp,
00479                                 material_no,
00480                                 &density_g_cm3,
00481                                 &electron_density_m3,
00482                                 &I_eV,
00483                                 &alpha_g_cm2_MeV,
00484                                 &p_MeV,
00485                                 &m_g_cm2);
00486         float           density_kg_m3   =       density_g_cm3 * 1000.0f;
00487 
00488 
00489         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Test){
00490                 // Loop over all r_m given
00491                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00492                         D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       0.0f;
00493                         if (r_m[i] < f1_parameters[2]){
00494                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       f1_parameters[5];
00495                         } else {
00496                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       0;
00497                         }
00498                 }
00499         }// end RDD_Test
00500 
00501 
00502         if( *rdd_model == RDD_KatzPoint || *rdd_model == RDD_Site || *rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00503                 // Get beta, Z and Zeff
00504                 float   beta            = 0.0f;
00505                 long    Z                       = 0;
00506                 float   Z_eff           = 0.0f;
00507                 SGP_beta_from_particle_no(      &n_tmp,
00508                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00509                                                                         particle_no,
00510                                                                         &beta);
00511                 SGP_Z_from_particle_no( &n_tmp,
00512                                                                 particle_no,
00513                                                                 &Z);
00514                 SGP_effective_charge_from_beta( &n_tmp,
00515                                                                                 &beta,
00516                                                                                 &Z,
00517                                                                                 &Z_eff);
00518 
00519                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00520                 float alpha                             =       1.667f;
00521                 float w_el_keV                  =       2.0f * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * 1000.0f * beta*beta / (1 - beta*beta);
00522                 if(w_el_keV <= 1.0f){
00523                         alpha                                   = 1.079f;
00524                 }
00525                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00526 
00527                 // Loop over all r_m given
00528                 float Katz_point_coeff_Gy = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_coeff_Gy(&(f1_parameters[5]),&Z_eff,&beta,&alpha,&density_kg_m3,&(f1_parameters[2]));
00529                 float a0                          = rdd_parameter[1];
00530 #ifdef _DEBUG
00531         fprintf(debf,"%sKatzPoint_coeff = %g\n", isp, Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00532 #endif
00533                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00534                         D_RDD_Gy[i]                             =       0.0f;                                                                                           // r < r_min_m (for RDD_KatzPoint) or r > r_max_m --> D = 0
00535                         if (r_m[i] >= f1_parameters[1] && r_m[i] <= f1_parameters[2] && *rdd_model != RDD_ExtTarget){                                   // in between r_min and r_max --> D = KatzPoint
00536                                 //D_RDD_Gy[i]                           = f1_parameters[5] * Z_eff*Z_eff / (2.0f * pi * r_m[i]*r_m[i] * beta*beta * alpha * density_kg_m3) * pow(1.0f - r_m[i] / f1_parameters[2], 1.0f / alpha);
00537                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]                             = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_Gy(&(r_m[i]),&alpha,&(f1_parameters[2]),&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00538                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]                             = FMAX(D_RDD_Gy[i], f1_parameters[3]);                          // Cut-off low doses
00539                         }
00540                         if (r_m[i] <= f1_parameters[1] && *rdd_model == RDD_Site){                                              // r < r_min_m (for RDD_Site) --> D = d_max_Gy
00541                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]                             = f1_parameters[4];
00542                         }
00543                         if (r_m[i] <= f1_parameters[2] && *rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00544                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]                             = SGP_RDD_Katz_ext_Gy(&(r_m[i]),&a0,&alpha,&(f1_parameters[1]),&(f1_parameters[2]),&Katz_point_coeff_Gy);
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547         }// end RDD_KatzPoint & RDD_Site
00548 
00549         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Geiss){
00550                 // Loop over all r_m given
00551                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00552                         D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       0.0f;
00553                         if (r_m[i] < f1_parameters[1]){
00554                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       f1_parameters[5];
00555                         }
00556                         if ((f1_parameters[1] <= r_m[i]) && (r_m[i] <= f1_parameters[2])){
00557                                 D_RDD_Gy[i]             =       f1_parameters[5] * (f1_parameters[1] / r_m[i]) * (f1_parameters[1] / r_m[i]);
00558                         }
00559                 }
00560         }// end RDD_Geiss
00561 
00562         free(f1_parameters);
00563 
00564 #ifdef _DEBUG
00565         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_D_RDD_Gy\n", isp);
00566         indnt_dec();
00567 #endif
00568 }
00569 
00570 typedef struct {
00571         long*   n;
00572         float*  r_m;
00573         /* radiation field parameters */
00574         float*  E_MeV_u;
00575         long*   particle_no;
00576         /* detector parameters */
00577         long*   material_no;
00578         /* radial dose distribution model */
00579         long*   rdd_model;
00580         float*  rdd_parameter;
00581         /* electron range model */
00582         long*   er_model;
00583         float*  er_parameter;
00584         /* calculated parameters */
00585         float*  D_RDD_Gy;
00586         float   D0;
00587 } SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters;
00588 
00589 float SGP_D_RDD_Gy_solver( float r , void * params ){
00590         SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters* params_struct = (SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters*)(params);
00591         *((*params_struct).n) = 1;
00592         params_struct->r_m = (float*)calloc(1,sizeof(float));
00593         (params_struct->r_m)[0] = r;
00594         SGP_D_RDD_Gy(   params_struct->n,
00595                                         params_struct->r_m,
00596                                         params_struct->E_MeV_u,
00597                                         params_struct->particle_no,
00598                                         params_struct->material_no,
00599                                         params_struct->rdd_model,
00600                                         params_struct->rdd_parameter,
00601                                         params_struct->er_model,
00602                                         params_struct->er_parameter,
00603                                         params_struct->D_RDD_Gy);
00604         free(params_struct->r_m);
00605         return (params_struct->D_RDD_Gy)[0]-(params_struct->D0);
00606 }
00607 
00608 
00609 void SGP_r_RDD_m        (       long*   n,
00610                 float*  D_RDD_Gy,
00611                 /* radiation field parameters */
00612                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00613                 long*   particle_no,
00614                 /* detector parameters */
00615                 long*   material_no,
00616                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00617                 long*   rdd_model,       /* */
00618                 float*  rdd_parameter,   /* parameters: LEM: E_MeV_u, particle_no, material_name, a0 */
00619                 /* electron range model */
00620                 long*   er_model,
00621                 float*  er_parameter,
00622                 float*  r_RDD_m)
00623 {
00624         #ifdef _DEBUG
00625                 indnt_init();
00626                 indnt_inc();
00627                 fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_r_RDD_m\n",isp);
00628         #endif
00629 
00630                 // conversion through int
00631         #ifdef _R
00632                 int n_int = (int)(*n);
00633                 *n = (long)n_int;
00634 
00635                 int rdd_model_int = (int)(*rdd_model);
00636                 *rdd_model = (long)rdd_model_int;
00637 
00638                 int er_model_int = (int)(*er_model);
00639                 *er_model = (long)er_model_int;
00640 
00641                 int material_no_int     = (int)(*material_no);
00642                 *material_no = (long)material_no_int;
00643 
00644                 int particle_no_int = (int)(*particle_no);
00645                 *particle_no = (long)particle_no_int;
00646         #endif
00647 
00648         #ifdef _DEBUG
00649                 fprintf(debf,"%sn = %ld\n", isp, *n);
00650                 fprintf(debf,"%sModel = %ld \n", isp, *rdd_model);
00651         #endif
00652 
00653         long            i;
00654         long            n_tmp                   = 1;
00655         // Get f1 parameters
00656         long            n_f1_parameters = 9;
00657         float*          f1_parameters   = (float*)calloc(n_f1_parameters, sizeof(float));
00658         SGP_RDD_f1_parameters(                  /* radiation field parameters */
00659                 E_MeV_u,
00660                 particle_no,
00661                 /* detector parameters */
00662                 material_no,
00663                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00664                 rdd_model,
00665                 rdd_parameter,
00666                 /* electron range model */
00667                 er_model,
00668                 er_parameter,
00669                 /* calculated parameters */
00670                 f1_parameters);
00671         // Get material data
00672         float           density_g_cm3, electron_density_m3, I_eV, alpha_g_cm2_MeV, p_MeV, m_g_cm2;
00673         SGP_getMaterialData(    &n_tmp,
00674                                 material_no,
00675                                 &density_g_cm3,
00676                                 &electron_density_m3,
00677                                 &I_eV,
00678                                 &alpha_g_cm2_MeV,
00679                                 &p_MeV,
00680                                 &m_g_cm2);
00681                 float           density_kg_m3   =       density_g_cm3 * 1000.0f;
00682 
00683         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Test){
00684                 // Loop over all doses given
00685                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00686                         r_RDD_m[i]              =       0.0f;
00687                         if (D_RDD_Gy[i] > 0.0f){
00688                                 r_RDD_m[i]              =       f1_parameters[2];
00689                         }
00690                 }
00691         }// end RDD_Test
00692 
00693         if( *rdd_model == RDD_Geiss){
00694                 // Loop over all doses given
00695                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00696                         // if D is outside the definition, return -1
00697                         r_RDD_m[i]              =       -1.0f;
00698                         if ((f1_parameters[3] <= D_RDD_Gy[i]) && (D_RDD_Gy[i] <= f1_parameters[4])){
00699                                 r_RDD_m[i]              =       f1_parameters[1] * (float)sqrt(f1_parameters[5] / D_RDD_Gy[i]);}
00700                 }
00701         }// end RDD_Geiss
00702 
00703         if( (*rdd_model == RDD_KatzPoint) || (*rdd_model == RDD_Site) || (*rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget)){
00704                 SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters* params = (SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters*)calloc(1,sizeof(SGP_D_RDD_Gy_parameters));
00705                 params->n                               = (long*)calloc(1,sizeof(long));
00706                 params->E_MeV_u                 = E_MeV_u;
00707                 params->particle_no             = particle_no;
00708                 params->material_no             = material_no;
00709                 params->rdd_model               = rdd_model;
00710                 params->rdd_parameter   = rdd_parameter;
00711                 params->er_model                = er_model;
00712                 params->er_parameter    = er_parameter;
00713                 params->D_RDD_Gy                = (float*)calloc(1,sizeof(float));
00714                 // Loop over all doses given
00715                 float dev = 0.01f;
00716                 float critical_d_Gy             = 0.0f;
00717                 float critical_r_m              = 0.0f;
00718                 float inv2_d_Gy                 = 0.0f;
00719                 float inv2_r_m          = 0.0f;
00720                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site){
00721                         critical_r_m            = rdd_parameter[0] * (1.0f + 1e-6f);
00722                         inv2_r_m                        = FMAX(rdd_parameter[0], f1_parameters[2] * dev);
00723                 }
00724                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00725                         critical_r_m            = rdd_parameter[1];
00726                         inv2_r_m                        = FMAX(rdd_parameter[0], f1_parameters[2] * dev);
00727                 }
00728                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site || *rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00729                         SGP_D_RDD_Gy    (       &n_tmp,                                                                         // Use D(r) to find dose at jump of D_Site
00730                                                                 &critical_r_m,
00731                                                                 /* radiation field parameters */
00732                                                                 E_MeV_u,
00733                                                                 particle_no,
00734                                                                 /* detector parameters */
00735                                                                 material_no,
00736                                                                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00737                                                                 rdd_model,
00738                                                                 rdd_parameter,
00739                                                                 /* electron range model */
00740                                                                 er_model,
00741                                                                 er_parameter,
00742                                                                 &critical_d_Gy);
00743                         SGP_D_RDD_Gy    (       &n_tmp,                                                                         // Use D(r) to find dose at jump of D_Site
00744                                                                 &inv2_r_m,
00745                                                                 /* radiation field parameters */
00746                                                                 E_MeV_u,
00747                                                                 particle_no,
00748                                                                 /* detector parameters */
00749                                                                 material_no,
00750                                                                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00751                                                                 rdd_model,
00752                                                                 rdd_parameter,
00753                                                                 /* electron range model */
00754                                                                 er_model,
00755                                                                 er_parameter,
00756                                                                 &inv2_d_Gy);
00757                 }
00758 
00759 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00760 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00761                 // Get beta, Z and Zeff
00762                 float   beta            = 0.0f;
00763                 long    Z                       = 0;
00764                 float   Z_eff           = 0.0f;
00765                 SGP_beta_from_particle_no(      &n_tmp,
00766                                                                         E_MeV_u,
00767                                                                         particle_no,
00768                                                                         &beta);
00769                 SGP_Z_from_particle_no( &n_tmp,
00770                                                                 particle_no,
00771                                                                 &Z);
00772                 SGP_effective_charge_from_beta( &n_tmp,
00773                                                                                 &beta,
00774                                                                                 &Z,
00775                                                                                 &Z_eff);
00776 
00777                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00778                 float alpha                             =       1.667f;
00779                 float w_el_keV                  =       2.0f * electron_mass_MeV_c2 * 1000.0f * beta*beta / (1 - beta*beta);
00780                 if(w_el_keV <= 1.0f){
00781                         alpha                                   = 1.079f;
00782                 }
00783                 //////////////////////// PRELIMINARY: alpha only according to Katz E-R model ////////////////////////////
00784 
00785                 float Katz_point_coeff_Gy = SGP_RDD_Katz_point_coeff_Gy(&(f1_parameters[5]),&Z_eff,&beta,&alpha,&density_kg_m3,&(f1_parameters[2]));
00786 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00787 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00788                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00789                         params->D0 = D_RDD_Gy[i];
00790                         // if D is outside the definition, return -1
00791                         r_RDD_m[i]                              =       -1.0f;
00792                         float   solver_accuracy =       1e-13f;
00793                         if ((f1_parameters[3] <= D_RDD_Gy[i]) && (D_RDD_Gy[i] <= f1_parameters[4])){
00794                                 if(D_RDD_Gy[i] >= critical_d_Gy){
00795                                         if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site){
00796                                                 r_RDD_m[i] = rdd_parameter[0];}
00797                                         if(*rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00798                                                 r_RDD_m[i] = rdd_parameter[1];}
00799                                 }
00800                                 if(*rdd_model == RDD_Site || *rdd_model == RDD_ExtTarget){
00801                                         if(D_RDD_Gy[i] < critical_d_Gy && D_RDD_Gy[i] >= inv2_d_Gy){
00802                                                 r_RDD_m[i] = sqrt(Katz_point_coeff_Gy / D_RDD_Gy[i]) * f1_parameters[2];}
00803                                         if(D_RDD_Gy[i] < inv2_d_Gy){
00804                                                 r_RDD_m[i] = zriddr(SGP_D_RDD_Gy_solver,
00805                                                                                 (void*)params,
00806                                                                                 f1_parameters[1],
00807                                                                                 f1_parameters[2],
00808                                                                                 solver_accuracy);
00809                                         }
00810                                 }else{
00811                                         r_RDD_m[i] = zriddr(SGP_D_RDD_Gy_solver,
00812                                                                         (void*)params,
00813                                                                         f1_parameters[1],
00814                                                                         f1_parameters[2],
00815                                                                         solver_accuracy);
00816 
00817                                 }
00818                         }
00819                 }
00820                 free(params->n);
00821                 free(params->D_RDD_Gy);
00822                 free(params);
00823         }// end RDD_KatzPoint & RDD_Site
00824 
00825 
00826         free(f1_parameters);
00827 
00828 #ifdef _DEBUG
00829                 fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_r_RDD_m\n", isp);
00830                 indnt_dec();
00831 #endif
00832 
00833 }
